quotes.quote: Sometimes it's not enough to know what things mean; sometimes you have to know what things don't mean.
quotes.author: Bob Dylan

quotes.quote: It is impossible to begin to learn that which one thinks one already knows.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
quotes.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

sectionDesc: A window to the inner world of depression: Video
